name: Image Generation Shared Settings
description: Shared configuration for image generation functionality, automatically available when any image engine is configured

openwebui_variables.name: ENABLE_IMAGE_PROMPT_GENERATION
openwebui_variables.description: Enable AI-powered prompt enhancement for better image generation results.

openwebui_variables.name: IMAGE_SIZE
openwebui_variables.description: Default image dimensions in WIDTHxHEIGHT format (e.g., 1024x1024).

openwebui_variables.name: IMAGE_STEPS
openwebui_variables.description: Number of diffusion steps for image generation (applies to Stable Diffusion models).
